name: part_007
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】『Connect Addict』✨3rd Anniversary Live【#獅白ぼたん3周年】 [dsH4DXtSpqk]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Shishiro Botan and Tsunomaki Watame perform "1,000,000 TIMES".
Shishiro Botan and Hoshimachi Suisei perform "Nomic".

subtitles.original: 僕は最後まで希望を捨てずにいるんだ
subtitles.english: I will not give up hope until the very end

subtitles.original: 真実は弱く儚くて 偽りは強く蝕むもの
subtitles.english: Truth is weak and fleeting, while falsehood is strong and corrosive

subtitles.original: 君と僕の結末なんて 『白』か『黒』じゃ決められないよ
subtitles.english: The end of you and me can't be decided as just 'white' or 'black'

subtitles.original: ありふれてる奇跡や
subtitles.english: Commonplace miracles and

subtitles.original: まちうけてる運命でも
subtitles.english: the destiny that awaits us,

subtitles.original: 一つじゃないから
subtitles.english: it's not just one thing

subtitles.original: 一人で
subtitles.english: Alone,

subtitles.original: 交わして
subtitles.english: interacting,

subtitles.original: 二人で
subtitles.english: as two,

subtitles.original: 合わせた
subtitles.english: coming together,

subtitles.original: あの日の約束を果たして...
subtitles.english: fulfilling the promise from that day...

subtitles.original: 愚かしく麗しい人生が 息苦しくても
subtitles.english: Even if this foolish and beautiful life feels suffocating,

subtitles.original: 目標は高ければ高いほど
subtitles.english: the higher the goal is,

subtitles.original: 乗り越える意味があるから
subtitles.english: the more meaning there is in overcoming it

subtitles.original: 1000000/1でも 「夢」が叶うなら
subtitles.english: Even if it's only 1 in 1,000,000, if the 'dream' comes true,

subtitles.original: 僕は何度でも 何度でも 闘い続けていくから
subtitles.english: I will keep fighting over and over again

subtitles.original: 主役がいなきゃ始まらないよ
subtitles.english: It won't start without the protagonist

subtitles.original: 勝負をつけなきゃ終われないよ
subtitles.english: It won't end until the showdown is settled

subtitles.original: 僕と君の物語には 誰も何も言えやしない
subtitles.english: In the story of you and me, no one can say anything

subtitles.original: ありきたりな世界を かたやぶりな世界へと変える
subtitles.english: Transforming an ordinary world into an unconventional one

subtitles.original: 一人じゃないから
subtitles.english: Because I'm not alone

subtitles.original: 決められたバイナリに従います 社交界の作法に溶け込みます
subtitles.english: Following the predetermined binaries, blending into the manners of high society

subtitles.original: それに価値器が満たされると信じてた
subtitles.english: I believed that would fill the vessel of my value

subtitles.original: 舞踏会に溢れた息遣い その裏にありあまる思惑が
subtitles.english: The breaths filling the ballroom, and the abundant motives lurking behind them,

subtitles.original: 重なり合って気づいたんだ 器の下は底抜けの状態だったんだ
subtitles.english: overlapped, and I realized: the bottom of the vessel had fallen out

subtitles.original: 器を満たす意味は潰え 積み重ねたものなど疾うに
subtitles.english: The meaning of filling the vessel has collapsed; the things I've built up are already gone,

subtitles.original: 無に帰した惨憺たる姿形と 現状抱える今日に
subtitles.english: returned to nothing in a miserable form, within this current day I face

subtitles.original: してやったという優越を かけらも奴らに与えない様に
subtitles.english: So as not to give them even a fragment of the superiority of having 'done it',

subtitles.original: 流れた価値を仲間と取り返そう 自ら器を作っていこう
subtitles.english: let's reclaim the lost value with friends, and build our own vessel

subtitles.original: 定石通りに動いてちゃ こんな人生つまんないな
subtitles.english: Moving according to the standard moves makes this life boring

subtitles.original: それならさ ギヤなんか壊して自分が望んだ結末をはめ込んでやれ
subtitles.english: In that case, break the gears and slot in the ending you desire

subtitles.original: ティーカップ裏に仕込んだ情報で 主役を演じていけ
subtitles.english: With the information hidden under the teacup, go on and play the lead role

subtitles.original: 信じたものを守り抜くことができる この世界はわたしだけの人生だ
subtitles.english: I can protect what I believe in; this world is my life alone

subtitles.original: わたしだけの人生だ
subtitles.english: It's my life alone

subtitles.original: 台本通りにかけられた言葉と 道行く人々の思想と顔
subtitles.english: The words spoken according to the script, and the thoughts and faces of people passing by,

subtitles.original: そのすべてが作り物であるとするならば
subtitles.english: if all of that is a fabrication,

subtitles.original: それすらも塗り替えてしまうような 誰よりも強いこの意思で
subtitles.english: then with this will, stronger than anyone's, that can paint over even that,

subtitles.original: すべて作り替え 誰もが想像し得なかった新たな未来へ
subtitles.english: remake everything, towards a new future no one could have imagined

subtitles.original: 定石通りに動いてちゃ こんな人生つまんないな
subtitles.english: Moving according to the standard moves makes this life boring

subtitles.original: それならさ ギヤなんか壊して自分が望んだ結末をはめ込んでやれ
subtitles.english: In that case, break the gears and slot in the ending you desire

subtitles.original: ティーカップ裏に仕込んだ情報で 主役を演じていけ
subtitles.english: With the information hidden under the teacup, go on and play the lead role

subtitles.original: 信じたものを守り抜く...
subtitles.english: Protecting what I believe in...
